EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Invite 3 - from Sales - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now for Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Accelerate - October 22nd, 2015 Novomatic Forum, Vienna 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Followed by buffet & reception
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales>
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
I would like to personally invite you to Tricentis Accelerate 2015. Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops, and networking.
Our program <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate> is now online.
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> to secure your free ticket.
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best regards,
Sales Name and Signature
PS: Highlights from Accelerate 2014 can be found here.
